entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as an inconsistent player who suffers from nerves and a lack of confidence. He is also shown to be prone to panicking in high-pressure situations, as seen when he punched Demelza Robins in the mouth during the game.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as scoring most of the goals against Ron. She also calls him a 'prat' for punching Demelza Robins in the mouth.

entities.name: demelza robins
entities.description: Demelza is described as being punched in the mouth by Ron during the game. She is also shown to be bleeding from her lip after the incident.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as trying to fix Demelza's injured lip with his wand and the spell 'Episkey'.

relationships.description: Ron punched Demelza Robins in the mouth during the game, causing her to bleed from her lip.
Harry used his wand and the spell 'Episkey' to try and fix Demelza's injured lip.
